attributes.action: Make It Mandatory for Infection Control Procedures to be carried out within health care settings
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
More and more patients are going into hospital and never leaving due to picking up hospital acquired infections.

It should be made mandatory within hospitals and care homes for ALL healthcare staff to HAVE no choice but to wash hands before and after caring for one individual patient, to prevent cross-infection.  

If this is done, the amount of hospital acquired infections will be reduced and hopefully the incidence of bugs such as MRSA will occur much less!
